title: Best Friend
lyrics: neujeun bam sure chwihan ni mok sori mwonga seulpeun iri isseotna bwa ni gyeote geu saramgwa mani datwottamyeo naege wirohae dallaneun neo neo animyeon na jung han myeongeun babo tteonajido dagagajido mothago geureul bara boneun neol barabomyeo nae jashineul dallae nun muri goyeo Cause you're so beauti ful to me gyeolguge urin chingu ro aiyaya niga geujeo kkumiram myeon yeppeugo seulpeun kkumira hal tende Why yaiya geu dalkomhan moksoriro neon naege malhae you are my best friend woeoeoeoeo woeoeoeoeo gakkeumsshik gidael saram geu jeongdomyeon gwaenchana woeoeoeoeo woeoeoeoeo gal got ireun seom hana You are my best friend saram maeum mi maeumdaero doel su isseottamyeon jin jage miryeon beoryeosseo I’m talking bout you and me neon geu saram soneul jab go meoreojyeo gudi geureo ke seon geutji malji yeoji dugo itteon saram minmanghage sseuldeeop shi yeppeuji malji maeil bam naejeok galdeunghae shimgakhage heundeullineun nareul deopchineun pado saranghan ge joeramyeon neoneun gamok amureochi aneun cheok maeumeul sogyeo neo ttaemune modeun ildeuri kkoyeo Cause you're so beauti ful to me gyeolguge urin chingu ro aiyaya niga geujeo kkumiram myeon yeppeugo seulpeun kkumira hal tende Why yaiya geu dalkomhan moksoriro neon naege malhae you are my best friend na honja mara go honja deutneun mal Hey boy you know I love you so neoege eonjen ga hago shipeun mal Hey boy you know I love you so woeoeoeoeo woeoeoeoeo gakkeumsshik gidael saram geu jeongdomyeon gwaenchana woeoeoeoeo woeoeoeoeo gal got ireun seom hana You are my best friend
